title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin on Baker and Wentz Ugly L's, Matt Mosley on Cowboys Huge Dak-less W
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin on Baker and Wentz Ugly L's, Matt Mosley on Cowboys Huge Dak-less W
description:
Colin dives into Baker Mayfield's rough outing against the Steelers (3:00), why Carson Wentz is dividing the Colts (6:00), what Mac Jones does that other rookie QBs don't normally do (8:00), what Twitter neglected to mention about Jimmy G (10:00), the NFC team to keep your eye on at the upcoming trade deadline, and why OBJ or DeSean Jackson could be heading there (12:00). Then, longtime Dallas Cowboys writer - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley and Colin react to the Cowboys beating the Vikings without Dak (18:00), why the win is so historically significant for Dallas (20:00), how Kirk Cousins got exposed (23:00), what Cooper Rush's success says about the Cowboys (25:00), how Amari Cooper and his WR teammates are stacking up in the eyes of Dallas fans (30:00), Matt's theory behind Dak's rigorous pre-game workout smokescreen (33:00)... and then they discuss Baker's performance against the Steelers (43:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
